title: Fawwaz wildan
author: Fawwaz wildan
content: The Premier League is the best league in the world and also the most competitive league every season,so it is difficult to predict which team will win.Likewise with the top scorer, it is difficult to predict who will come out as the top scorer at the end of the season,because almost every team has a striker who is hungry for goals. So your prediction is who will be the top scorer for the 2022-2023 season?1.M.Salah2.Erling Haaland3.Harry Kaneor players like Jamie Vardy, Darwin Nunez and Gabriel Jesus who are also potential top scorers.

comments.author: Bhig Daddy
comments.body: This coming season is going to be full of drama and anticipations and the race for the golden boot will be so interesting well as for me is see Erling Haalland lifting the golden boot not because he has been a prolific scorer but because of the team he is playing in, the like of kelvin De bryne and Bernardo Silva will feed him with so much good passes and I know haaland will be scoring nothing less 25 league goals, he is big, strong, and also very good in the air and with all of the I think you can really play well in the premier league. For me this season I go for haaland.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: Why limit the ranking to only three players?You forgot to include Marcus Rashford and Jadon Sancho from Manchester United, Gabriel Jesus from Arsenal and Pierre Erick Aybameyang from Chelsea. I also think that Darwin Nunez from Liverpool might score more goals than Mohamed Salah.The big favorite for becoming the top Premier League scorer in season 2022/2023 is Erling Haaland in my opinion.Tottenham needs better midfielders to supply Harry Kane with enough assists in order for him to score more goals. The Manchester City midfielders are better than Tottenham's midfielders.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I think this year based on the performance so far of each player it looks relatively clear to me that the top scorer will be Haaland.He is playing at Manchester City which is considered by many the best actual team of the Premier League that have invested a lot of money in the club and things are going relatively well.I think he has the best chances compared to other teams and other players performances so far but of course we are much early in the Premier League so there is tons of time until the end and this may change until then.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: I think this premiership year will be different and it may surprise us that the list that you have mentioned, the player that willÂ  become the highest go scorer may be different. You only mentioned few but I checked for potential highest goal scorer this season and 19 players already listed though with Haaland as the top for now with 10 goals.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Quote from: davis196 on September 12, 2022, 10:02:52 AMWhy limit the ranking to only three players?You forgot to include Marcus Rashford and Jadon Sancho from Manchester United, Gabriel Jesus from Arsenal and Pierre Erick Aybameyang from Chelsea. I also think that Darwin Nunez from Liverpool might score more goals than Mohamed Salah.The big favorite for becoming the top Premier League scorer in season 2022/2023 is Erling Haaland in my opinion.Tottenham needs better midfielders to supply Harry Kane with enough assists in order for him to score more goals. The Manchester City midfielders are better than Tottenham's midfielders.That's right Marcus Rashford very productive for Manchester United, although it has only packed 3 goals scores but its performance is quite worthy of being one of the competitors, more candidates are more interesting rather than only three players.Regarding Haaland there is no doubt that he is the favorite maybe everyone is voted this man, because performance in scoring of goals is very talented, but who knows there are players who have managed to overtake him, I think in the Premier League still have a many great players.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: I think we are too soon to talk about the top scorer in the 2022-2023 Premier League, considering that this round is still classified as the first half, most likely, M.Salah, Erling, Kane can shift and most likely the top score can change, it could happen because this is football, of course there is a risk indeed at this time if I'm not mistaken from the seven matches that have been played and 19 goals were created, Mohamed Salah is also included, this does not rule out the, as I said above.As well as Erling, although he is currently dubbed as the scorer for Man City's victory, Tottenham also have Harry in the English league at this time as the top scorer, although currently Erling is ranked [1], Harry is ranked [3], I believe changes in the top score can occur, and taken by Alexander Mitrovi, Ivan Toney, Rodrigo, I believe changes can occur.

comments.author: minime0105
comments.body: What i have to say is that the league just soon started and since it started recently it will be very to know the best or the player that will be the best highest goal scorer. and besides no club now is lacking a striker, many clubs bought new players, and assuming they did not stop match this last weekend we would have consider the calculation and also predict the remaining weeks that this player can be the highest goal scorer of this tournament.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: You mentioned Salah, Haaland, Kane, Vardy, Nunez and Jesus, how you can missed Aleksandar Mitrovic which currently on the top 2 of the most scorers on Premier League this season? he's deserve to be included.I used to believe Salah will become the top scorers on Liverpool, but after watching him on few weeks, I think he's currently underperform and I don't expect anything from him.There's a big chance Haaland will become the top scorer since he's very aggressive striker and there's no one who similar like him.

comments.author: kotwica666
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on September 12, 2022, 01:10:36 PMI think we are too soon to talk about the top scorer in the 2022-2023 Premier League, considering that this round is still classified as the first half, most likely, M.Salah, Erling, Kane can shift and most likely the top score can change, it could happen because this is football, of course there is a risk indeed at this time if I'm not mistaken from the seven matches that have been played and 19 goals were created, Mohamed Salah is also included, this does not rule out the, as I said above.As well as Erling, although he is currently dubbed as the scorer for Man City's victory, Tottenham also have Harry in the English league at this time as the top scorer, although currently Erling is ranked [1], Harry is ranked [3], I believe changes in the top score can occur, and taken by Alexander Mitrovi, Ivan Toney, Rodrigo, I believe changes can occur.Agree with you. In fact, they are all good goal scorers. They are scoring goals in every match. There will be more competition between them in a few days. They play their best for their team and score goals that boost their individual careers.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: the 2022-2023 season is still very early. it will be difficult to predict the top scorer with 6 recent matches. of course, there is a possibility that there will be other names that might be able to compete with the 3 names mentioned.until this week, Man City's new striker appeared very scary. Erling scored 10 goals in 6 games. I think it's a difficult achievement for any player in the Premier League to match.Moh Salah may still lag behind other competitors. that's because Liverpool's performance was not so good at the start of the season. I hope to see Salah perform as scary as last season.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: It is difficult to determine the top scorer for the 2022/23 season because it is still early anything can change because the journey this season is still long there will definitely be several names at the end of the season who will become the top scorer but for now I can't predict even once Haaland has collected 10 goals in 6 competition.Remember this Premier League is very tight, anyone can overtake him, but here there are indeed many talented strikers, there is a possibility that one of them we don't know will be the top scorer, so be patient and wait until 1/2 season has passed.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Fawwaz wildan on September 06, 2022, 04:59:17 PM[/center]2.Erling Haaland I'm not a fan of Manchester City, but since the beginning of this season, I have loved Erling Haaland's style of football. He is the good attacker who utilized every given opportunity he gets and the best asset Manchester City could have this season after the just concluded transfer market. So if I'm to predict who may win the title of top goal scorer of the year, I think Erling Haaland is already halfway their haven scored 10 goals in 6 matches,

comments.author: ILuckyGuyI
comments.body: I think that you should think of some other impressive strikers on the recent weeks as well. For example, you can add Fulham's Mitrovic to this list too. Mitrovic has been amazing against every kind of team so far. He scored against big teams like Tottenham (1 goal), Arsenal (1 goal) and Liverpool (2 goals) also. There is only one game he didn't score so far. He will of course have a big difficulty against a beast like Haaland but it wouldn't be surprising to see Mitrovic being in top 3 at the end of the season.When it comes to Salah, he is far ahead of his usual performance and has only 2 goals in the league now. As long as Liverpool don't pull themselves together he also wouldn't change much. But even after recovering his job is going to be difficult to catch up with the leader in the top scorers table. It seems like Haaland is the biggest favourite by a big difference against the rest of the scorers for now.

comments.author: NdaMk
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on September 12, 2022, 01:52:26 PMIt is difficult to determine the top scorer for the 2022/23 season because it is still early anything can change because the journey this season is still long there will definitely be several names at the end of the season who will become the top scorer but for now I can't predict even once Haaland has collected 10 goals in 6 competition.Remember this Premier League is very tight, anyone can overtake him, but here there are indeed many talented strikers, there is a possibility that one of them we don't know will be the top scorer, so be patient and wait until 1/2 season has passed.Although I know Halland will surely compete for the golden boot but I never thought he could just set the pace like this. Sincerely Halland is having it easy on this, because either the regular frontiers are having issues with there club or they are shadow of them.First is Sallah, two goals in six matches no one saw this coming but his goal drought has been caused by the switch of roles by Klopp. Sallah was the pointed man during his mane-firmino-sallah trident. But right now he does the hard work mane and firmino were doing before and this has also affected the entire Liverpool teamNext is Harry Kane, one thing with him is he is always cold at the start of a season then goes back to normal middle of the season. I was even surprised to see him score in his sacred month (August). But let's wait and seeAnother person is arguably the greatest player of all time (Ronaldo), he has found it hard to just settle into Ten Hag team and with age happening to him I don't see him catching up. But Hey its Ronaldo, nobody rules him out. So I will put him there.Another slow starter to the season is last season's winner Son, I feel he hasn't just been himself.So since Halland isn't going to the World Cup then the odds are surely for him to win it

comments.author: Rabi3
comments.body: i think it's really hard for me to pick a player other than Halland in the premier league to be the top goalscorer, i was expecting him o pop off before he started playing wih Man City and he's still proving that he's one of the best strikers in the world, he is also playing with the "best" team in the league so he has a lot of advantages over other players.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Fawwaz wildan on September 06, 2022, 04:59:17 PMor players like Jamie VardyOther players could still have a shot at catching Haaland but I think Jamie is already done. It was great watching him deliver in the past seasons but there are many players stepping up now.Quote from: NdaMk on September 12, 2022, 07:52:35 PM....But Hey its Ronaldo, nobody rules him out. So I will put him there.I am hehe. I don't see him scoring two to three goals or even one in every game he plays. It's hard to get that momentum going when you don't start in games like you used to.

comments.author: 8rch7
comments.body: The competition has only been running for six weeks, of course, it is still very difficult to predict who will come out as the top scorer this season, but if I look at the cohesiveness of the team and players, I think Erling Haaland will get the golden boot this season, but the competition will continue to be tough. , although for now liferpol players have not united but I believe Moh Salah will be Erling Haaland's rival to get the top score this season.
